text: The men's 400 metres freestyle at the 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships was held at the National Aquatic Centre in Dublin from 13 - 19 August. 8 classification finals are held in all over this event. ==Medalists== {| |- |S6 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S6 Dublin 2018 Results book | || 5:09.96 | || 5:24.12 | || 5:39.88 |- |S7 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S7 | || 4:48.54 | || 4:48.69 | || 4:51.40 |- |S8 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S8 | || 4:40.78 | || 4:59.97 | || 5:00.26 |- |S9 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S9 | || 4:16.92 | || 4:18.30 | || 4:23.70 |- |S10 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S10 | || 4:01.86 | || 4:03.89 | || 4:06.61 |- |S11 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S11 | || 5:01.63 | || 5:17.56 | || 5:17.86 |- |S12 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S12 | || 4:08.00 | || 4:22.75 | || 4:36.11 |- |S13 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships S13 | || 4:01.12 | ||4:03.01 | || 4:13.04 |- |colspan=7| |- |- bgcolor= e8e8e8 |colspan=7| |} ==See also== *List of IPC world records in swimming ==References== 400 metres freestyle
title: 2018 World Para Swimming European Championships – Men's 400 metres freestyle
